>
[Ghoul Hide](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3272)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 278 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 220 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=44)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Stitched together from pieces of [ghoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=218) skin, this suit of _+1 [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=44)_ grants you a +1 item bonus to saving throws against [curses](/Traits.aspx?ID=566) and makes you immune to the stench of ghouls. Ghoul hide with a [resilient rune](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2786) increases the resilient rune's item bonus to saving throws against curses by 1 (maximum +4).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
